patch.description:
Added an experimental option to help sync from load balanced RPCs, where nodes may be slightly out of sync, causing data inconsistencies while fetching logs.

To enable this, use `INTERNAL__VALIDATE_BLOCK_RANGE=true` environment variable when starting up any of the indexers. This requires `RPC_HTTP_URL` to also be set.

Note that using this option makes an additional call to `eth_getBlockByNumber` for each `eth_getLogs` call and expects the RPC to support batched calls.

patch.description:
Added an experimental option to help sync from load balanced RPCs, where nodes may be slightly out of sync, causing data inconsistencies while fetching logs.

To enable this, replace `publicClient: Client` with `internal_clientOptions: { chain: Chain, validateBlockRange: true }` when calling any sync method (e.g. `syncToStash`). For `<SyncProvider>`, only a `internal_validateBlockRange` prop is needed.

```diff
-syncToStash({ publicClient, ... });
+syncToStash({ internal_clientOptions: { chain, validateBlockRange: true }, ... });
```

```diff
-<SyncProvider adapter={createSyncAdapter(...)}>
+<SyncProvider adapter={createSyncAdapter(...)} internal_validateBlockRange>
```

Note that using this option makes an additional call to `eth_getBlockByNumber` for each `eth_getLogs` call and expects the RPC to support batched calls.
patch.title: feat(store-indexer): add flag to validate block ranges (#3531)

patch.description:
Renamed `deploy-local-prereqs` bin to `entrykit-deploy`, which now accepts an RPC URL so that you can deploy the EntryKit prerequisites to your chain of choice.

```
RPC_URL=http://rpc.garnetchain.com pnpm entrykit-deploy
```

This bin supports specifying the RPC URL via `RPC_URL`, `RPC_HTTP_URL`, `FOUNDRY_ETH_RPC_URL` environment variables or `FOUNDRY_PROFILE` if using `eth_rpc_url` in `foundry.toml`.
patch.title: feat(entrykit): deploy prereqs to any chain (#3529)

patch.description:
Added an experimental option to help sync from load balanced RPCs, where nodes may be slightly out of sync, causing data inconsistencies while fetching logs.

To enable this, replace `publicClient: Client` with `internal_clientOptions: { chain: Chain, validateBlockRange: true }` when calling `fetchLogs` or `fetchBlockLogs`.

```diff
-fetchLogs({ publicClient, ... });
+fetchLogs({ internal_clientOptions: { chain, validateBlockRange: true }, ... });
```

Note that using this option makes an additional call to `eth_getBlockByNumber` for each `eth_getLogs` call and expects the RPC to support batched calls.

patch.description:
The `transactionQueue` decorator internally keeps an updated reference for the recommended `baseFeePerGas` and `maxPriorityFeePerGas` from the connected chain to avoid having to fetch it right before sending a transaction.
However, due to the way the fee values were overridden, it wasn't possible for users to explicitly pass in custom fee values.
Now explicitly provided fee values have precedence over the internally estimated fee values.

patch.description:
- For block range size errors, `fetchLogs` now reduces the max block range for subsequent requests in its loop. For block out of range or response size errors, only the current request's block range is reduced until the request succeeds, then it resets to the max block range.
- Added `fetchBlockLogs` to find all matching logs of the given block range, grouped by block number, in a single async call.
- Loosened the `publicClient` type and switched to tree shakable actions.
patch.title: feat(cli): paginate world deploy logs (#3217)

patch.description:
Added `@latticexyz/stash` package, a TypeScript client state library optimized for the MUD Store data model.
It uses the MUD store config to define local tables, which support writing, reading and subscribing to table updates.
It comes with a query engine optimized for "ECS-style" queries (similar to `@latticexyz/recs`) but with native support for composite keys.
patch.title: feat(stash): release package to npm (#3184)

patch.description:
Significantly improved the deployment performance for large projects with public libraries by implementing a more efficient algorithm to resolve public libraries during deployment.

patch.description:
To reset an account's nonce, the nonce manager uses the [`eth_getTransactionCount`](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/apis/json-rpc/#eth_gettransactioncount) RPC method,
which returns the number of transactions sent from the account.
When using the `pending` block tag, this includes transactions in the mempool that have not been included in a block yet.
If an account submits a transaction with a nonce higher than the next valid nonce, this transaction will stay in the mempool until the nonce gap is closed and the transactions nonce is the next valid nonce.
This means if an account has gapped transactions "stuck in the mempool", the `eth_getTransactionCount` method with `pending` block tag can't be used to get the next valid nonce
(since it includes the number of transactions stuck in the mempool).
Since the nonce manager only resets the nonce on reload or in case of a nonce error, using the `latest` block tag by default is the safer choice to be able to recover from nonce gaps.
patch.title: fix(common): use latest block tag in nonce manager (#3180)

major.title: docs: add store/world config changesets (#2497)

major.description: Moved table ID and field layout constants in code-generated table libraries from the file level into the library, for clearer access and cleaner imports.
major.title: refactor: move table ID and field layout constants into table library (#2327)

major.description: Set the protocol version to `2.0.0` for each Store and World.
major.title: feat(store,world): set protocol version, add tests (#2412)

major.description: Moved all existing exports to a `/internal` import path to indicate that these are now internal-only and deprecated. We'll be replacing these types and functions with new ones that are compatible with our new, strongly-typed config.
major.title: refactor(schema-type,protocol-parser): explicit internal vs external exports (#2452)

major.description: Added `dynamicFieldIndex` to the `Store_SpliceDynamicData` event. This enables indexers to store dynamic data as a blob per dynamic field without a schema lookup.
major.title: feat(store): add field index to Store_SpliceDynamicData event (#2279)

major.description: Renamed `PackedCounter` to `EncodedLengths` for consistency.
major.title: refactor: rename PackedCounter to EncodedLengths (#2490)

major.description: PostgreSQL sync/indexer now uses `{storeAddress}` for its database schema names and `{namespace}__{tableName}` for its database table names (or just `{tableName}` for root namespace), to be more consistent with the rest of the MUD codebase.
major.title: feat(store-sync): adjust DB schema/table names for consistency (#2379)

major.description: Migrated to new config format.
major.title: feat: use new config (#2483)

major.description: Added an `--rpcBatch` option to `mud deploy` command to batch RPC calls for rate limited RPCs.
major.title: feat(cli): add a RPC batch option to cli (#2322)

major.description: Added a `followBlockTag` option to configure which block number to follow when running `createStoreSync`. It defaults to `latest` (current behavior), which is recommended for individual clients so that you always have the latest chain state.
major.title: feat(store-sync,store-indexer): add followBlockTag option (#2315)

major.description: `registerRootFunctionSelector` now expects a `systemFunctionSignature` instead of a `systemFunctionSelector`. Internally, we compute the selector from the signature. This allows us to track system function signatures that are registered at the root so we can later generate ABIs for these systems.
major.title: refactor(world): registerRootFunctionSelector takes system signature (#2395)

major.description: Added viem custom client actions that work the same as MUD's now-deprecated `getContract`, `writeContract`, and `sendTransaction` wrappers. Templates have been updated to reflect the new patterns.
major.title: feat(common): add viem actions that work the same as the current wrappers (#2347)

major.description: Added an `abstract` `StoreKernel` contract, which includes all Store interfaces except for registration, and implements write methods, `protocolVersion` and initializes `StoreCore`. `Store` extends `StoreKernel` with the `IStoreRegistration` interface. `StoreData` is removed as a separate interface/contract. `World` now extends `StoreKernel` (since the registration methods are added via the `InitModule`).
major.title: refactor(store): add StoreWrite and Store abstract contracts (#2411)

major.description: Replaced the static array length getters in table libraries with constants.
major.title: refactor(store): make static array length a constant (#2410)

major.description: Now uses `--isolate` flag in `forge test` for more accurate gas measurement.
major.title: feat(gas-report): run gas report with --isolate (#2331)

major.description: `mud deploy` now supports public/linked libraries.
major.title: feat(cli): link and deploy public libraries (#1910)

major.description: Moved key schema and value schema methods to constants in code-generated table libraries for less bytecode and less gas in register/install methods.
major.title: refactor: hardcode key/value schema in table libraries (#2328)

major.description: Upgraded all packages and templates to viem v2.7.12 and abitype v1.0.0.
major.title: feat: upgrade viem to v2 (#2284)

major.description: Attempting to deploy multiple systems where there are overlapping system IDs now throws an error.
major.title: fix(cli): throw error when deploying overlapping systems (#2325)

major.description: `waitForIdle` now falls back to `setTimeout` for environments without `requestIdleCallback`.
major.title: fix(common): use `setTimeout` as fallback for `requestIdleCallback` (#2406)

major.description: Updated all human-readable resource IDs to use `{namespace}__{name}` for consistency with world function signatures.
major.title: refactor: human-readable resource IDs use double underscore (#2310)

major.description: Removed some unused files, namely `curry` in `@latticexyz/common` and `useDeprecatedComputedValue` from `@latticexyz/react`.
major.title: chore: remove some unused files (#2398)

major.description: ERC20 and ERC721 implementations now always register the token namespace, instead of checking if it has already been registered. This prevents issues with registering the namespace beforehand, namely that only the owner of a system can create a puppet for it.
major.title: fix(world-modules): token modules always register namespace (#2352)

major.description: Refactored `StoreCore` to import `IStoreEvents` instead of defining the events twice.
major.title: refactor(store): store core imports store events (#2356)

major.description: Added salt to the `WorldDeployed` event.
major.title: feat(world): emit salt in WorldDeployed event (#2301)

major.description: Bumped `typescript` to `5.4.2`, `eslint` to `8.57.0`, and both `@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin` and `@typescript-eslint/parser` to `7.1.1`.
major.title: chore: upgrade to typescript 5.4.2 (#2397)

major.description: `resourceToLabel` now correctly returns just the resource name if its in the root namespace.
major.title: fix(common): remove underscore prefix from root namespace labels (#2400)

major.description: Removed the @latticexyz/noise package.
major.title: chore(noise): remove noise package (#2304)

major.description: Added interfaces for all errors that are used by `StoreCore`, which includes `FieldLayout`, `PackedCounter`, `Schema`, and `Slice`. This interfaces are inherited by `IStore`, ensuring that all possible errors are included in the `IStore` ABI for proper decoding in the frontend.
major.title: refactor(store): event interfaces for Store libraries (#2348)

major.description: Moved the transaction simulation step to just before sending the transaction in our transaction queue actions (`sendTransaction` and `writeContract`).
major.title: docs: add missing changeset (#2374)

major.description: Restored `Bytes.sliceN` helpers that were previously (mistakenly) removed and renamed them to `Bytes.getBytesN`.
major.title: fix(store): restore bytesN helpers (#2403)

major.description: Upgraded prettier version to 3.2.5 and prettier-plugin-solidity version to 1.3.1.
major.title: chore: upgrade prettier to 3.2.5 and prettier-plugin-solidity to 1.3.1 (#2303)

major.description: Added system signatures to the `FunctionSignatures` table, so they can be used to generate system ABIs and decode system calls made via the world.
major.title: feat(world): add system signatures to FunctionSignatures (#2392)

major.description: Fixed gas report parsing for foundry versions released after 2024-02-15.
major.title: fix(gas-report): update filename matcher (#2277)

major.description: Added `dbaeumer.vscode-eslint` and `esbenp.prettier-vscode` to recommended VSCode extensions.
major.title: feat(create-mud): add additional recommended vscode extensions (#2440)

major.description: Created an `IWorldEvents` interface with `HelloStore`, so all World events are defined in a single interface.
major.title: refactor(world): add IWorldEvents with HelloWorld (#2358)

major.description: Fixes an issue with Zustand store sync where multiple updates to a record for a key in the same block did not get tracked and applied properly.
major.title: fix(store-sync): track changed records together in zustand (#2387)

major.description: Moved the `HelloStore` to `IStoreEvents` so all Store events are defined in the same interface.
major.title: refactor(store): hellostore in IStoreEvents (#2357)

major.description: `IWorldKernel` now inherits `IModuleErrors` so it can render the correct errors if the World reverts when delegatecalled with Module code.
major.title: feat(world): world kernel inherits `IModuleErrors` (#2380)

major.description: Added a non-deterministic fallback for deploying to chains that have replay protection on and do not support pre-EIP-155 transactions (no chain ID).
major.title: feat(cli): deterministic deployer fallback (#2261)

major.description: Renamed the `functionSelector` key in the `FunctionSelectors` table to `worldFunctionSelector`. This clarifies that `FunctionSelectors` is for world function selectors and can be used to generate the world ABI.
major.title: refactor(world): rename functionSelector to worldFunctionSelector (#2391)

major.description: Bumped Solidity version to 0.8.24.
major.title: chore: upgrade to Solidity 0.8.24 (#2202)

major.description: Renamed `CoreModule` to `InitModule` and `CoreRegistrationSystem` to `RegistrationSystem`.
major.title: feat(world): rename CoreModule to InitModule (#2227)

major.description: `WorldFactory` now expects a user-provided `salt` when calling `deployWorld(...)` (instead of the previous globally incrementing counter). This enables deterministic world addresses across different chains.
major.title: feat(cli,world): add user defined salt in WorldFactory.deployWorld() (#2219)

major.description: Renamed `StoreCore`'s `registerCoreTables` method to `registerInternalTables`.
major.title: feat(store): rename StoreCore.registerCoreTables to registerInternalTables (#2225)

major.description: Fixed `SystemSwitch` to properly call non-root systems from root systems.
major.title: fix(world-modules): `SystemSwitch` properly calls systems from root (#2205)

major.description: `createStoreSync` now [waits for idle](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/requestIdleCallback) between each chunk of logs in a block to allow for downstream render cycles to trigger. This means that hydrating logs from an indexer will no longer block until hydration completes, but rather allow for `onProgress` callbacks to trigger.
major.title: feat(store-sync): wait for idle after each chunk of logs in a block (#2254)

major.description: `WorldFactory` now derives a salt based on number of worlds deployed by `msg.sender`, which should help with predictable world deployments across chains.
major.title: feat(world): deployment salt by msg.sender (#2210)

major.description: Table libraries now hardcode the `bytes32` table ID value rather than computing it in Solidity. This saves a bit of gas across all storage operations.
major.title: feat(cli): hardcode table ID with codegen (#2229)

major.description: Fixed a race condition when registering core tables, where we would set a record in the `ResourceIds` table before the table was registered.
major.title: fix(store): reorder core table registration (#2164)

major.description: Bumped the Postgres column size for `int32`, `uint32`, `int64`, and `uint64` types to avoid overflows
major.title: fix(store-sync): fix overflowing column types, bump postgres sync version (#2270)

major.description: Moved boolean array types to use array column types (instead of JSON columns) for the Postgres decoded indexer
major.title: feat(store-sync): bool array column types for decoded indexer (#2283)

major.description: Moved numerical array types to use array column types (instead of JSON columns) for the Postgres decoded indexer
major.title: docs: add missing changeset (#2282)

major.description: Fixed registration of world signatures/selectors for namespaced systems. We changed these signatures in [#2160](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/pull/2160), but missed updating part of the deploy step.
major.title: docs: changeset for #2187 (#2188)

major.description: Prevented errors not included in the contract (but present in the file) from being included in the interface by `contractToInterface`
major.title: fix(common): include only errors defined in the contract (#2194)

major.description: Refactored `StoreCore.registerStoreHook` to use `StoreHooks._push` for gas efficiency.
major.title: refactor(store): push to StoreHooks with StoreCore method (#2201)

major.description: Renamed the Module `args` parameter to `encodedArgs` to better reflect that it is ABI-encoded arguments.
major.title: refactor(world,world-modules): rename module args to encodedArgs (#2199)

major.description: Updated deployer with world's new `InitModule` naming.
major.title: feat(world): rename CoreModule to InitModule (#2227)

major.description: Refactored `InstalledModules` to key modules by addresses instead of pre-defined names. Previously, modules could report arbitrary names, meaning misconfigured modules could be installed under a name intended for another module.
major.title: chore: add module addresses changeset (#2172)

major.description: Separated core systems deployment from `CoreModule`, and added the systems as arguments to `CoreModule`
major.title: refactor(cli,world,world-modules): split and separately deploy core systems (#2128)

major.description:
- Split `CoreSystem` into `AccessManagementSystem`, `BalanceTransferSystem`, `BatchCallSystem`, `CoreRegistrationSystem`
- Changed `CoreModule` to receive the addresses of these systems as arguments, instead of deploying them
- Replaced `CORE_SYSTEM_ID` constant with `ACCESS_MANAGEMENT_SYSTEM_ID`, `BALANCE_TRANSFER_SYSTEM_ID`, `BATCH_CALL_SYSTEM_ID`, `CORE_REGISTRATION_SYSTEM_ID`, for each respective system
major.title: refactor(cli,world,world-modules): split and separately deploy core systems (#2128)

major.description: Postgres storage adapter now uses snake case for decoded table names and column names. This allows for better SQL ergonomics when querying these tables.
major.title: fix(cli): mud set-version --link shouldn't fetch versions (#2000)

major.description: Removed `allowEmpty` option from `FieldLayout.validate()` as field layouts should never be empty.
major.title: feat(store): never allow empty FieldLayout (#2122)

major.description: Removed `IUniqueEntitySystem` in favor of calling `getUniqueEntity` via `world.call` instead of the world function selector. This had a small gas improvement.
major.title: refactor(world-modules): simplify getUniqueEntity call (#2161)

major.description: Improved `syncToZustand` speed of hydrating from snapshot by only applying block logs once per block instead of once per log.
major.title: fix(store-sync): improve syncToZustand hydration speed (#2145)

major.description: `lastUpdatedBlockNumber` columns in Postgres storage adapters are no longer nullable
major.title: fix(store-sync,store-indexer): make last updated block number not null (#1972)

major.description: Renamed singleton `chain` table to `config` table for clarity.
major.title: feat(store-indexer): clean database if outdated (#1984)

major.description: The postgres indexer is now storing the `logIndex` of the last update of a record to be able to return the snapshot logs in the order they were emitted onchain.
major.title: feat(store-sync, store-indexer): order logs by logIndex (#2037)

major.description: Previously, all `store-sync` strategies were susceptible to a potential memory leak where the stream that fetches logs from the RPC would get ahead of the stream that stores the logs in the provided storage adapter. We saw this most often when syncing to remote Postgres servers, where inserting records was much slower than we retrieving them from the RPC. In these cases, the stream would build up a backlog of items until the machine ran out of memory.
major.title: feat(store-sync): fetch and store logs (#2003)

major.description: `syncToPostgres` from `@latticexyz/store-sync/postgres` now uses a single table to store all records in their bytes form (`staticData`, `encodedLengths`, and `dynamicData`), more closely mirroring onchain state and enabling more scalability and stability for automatic indexing of many worlds.
major.title: feat(store-sync,store-indexer): schemaless indexer (#1965)

major.description: Postgres storage adapter now uses snake case for decoded table names and column names. This allows for better SQL ergonomics when querying these tables.
major.title: feat(store-sync): snake case postgres names in decoded tables (#1989)

major.description: Refactored how we fetch snapshots from an indexer, preferring the new `getLogs` endpoint and falling back to the previous `findAll` if it isn't available. This refactor also prepares for an easier entry point for adding client caching of snapshots.
major.title: feat(store-sync,store-indexer): sync from getLogs indexer endpoint (#1973)

major.description: Replaced usage of `window` global in vanilla JS template with an event listener on the button.
major.title: feat(create-mud): remove window global usage in vanilla template (#1774)

major.description: Added a `mud build` command that generates table libraries, system interfaces, and typed ABIs.
major.title: feat(cli): add build command (#1990)

major.description: Added `unique` and `groupBy` array helpers to `@latticexyz/common/utils`.
major.title: feat(store-sync,store-indexer): schemaless indexer (#1965)

major.description: The `findAll` method is now considered deprecated in favor of a new `getLogs` method. This is only implemented in the Postgres indexer for now, with SQLite coming soon. The new `getLogs` method will be an easier and more robust data source to hydrate the client and other indexers and will allow us to add streaming updates from the indexer in the near future.
major.title: feat(store-sync,store-indexer): schemaless indexer (#1965)

major.description: When the Postgres indexer starts up, it will now attempt to detect if the database is outdated and, if so, cleans up all MUD-related schemas and tables before proceeding.
major.title: feat(store-indexer): clean database if outdated (#1984)

major.description: - Added a `Result<Ok, Err>` type for more explicit and typesafe error handling ([inspired by Rust](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/result/)).
major.title: feat(store-indexer, store-sync): improve query performance and enable compression, add new api (#2026)

major.description: Added and populated `syncProgress` key in Zustand store for sync progress, like we do for RECS sync. This will let apps using `syncToZustand` render a loading state while initial client hydration is in progress.
major.title: docs: add changeset for zustand sync progress (#1931)

major.description: Updated `chunk` types to use readonly arrays
major.title: feat(store-sync,store-indexer): sync from getLogs indexer endpoint (#1973)

major.description: Added `getLogs` query support to sqlite indexer
major.title: feat(store-sync,store-indexer): sync from getLogs indexer endpoint (#1973)

major.description:
- Improved query performance by 10x by moving from drizzle ORM to handcrafted SQL.
- Moved away from `trpc` for more granular control over the transport layer.
  Added an `/api/logs` endpoint using the new query and gzip compression for 40x less data transferred over the wire.
  Deprecated the `/trpc/getLogs` and `/trpc/findAll` endpoints.
- Added a `createIndexerClient` client for the new `/api` indexer API exported from `@latticexyz/store-sync/indexer-client`.
  The `createIndexerClient` export from `@latticexyz/store-sync/trpc-indexer` is deprecated.
major.title: feat(store-indexer, store-sync): improve query performance and enable compression, add new api (#2026)

major.description: The `/api/logs` indexer endpoint is now returning a `404` snapshot not found error when no snapshot is found for the provided filter instead of an empty `200` response.
major.title: feat(store-indexer): return a "not found" error when no snapshot is found for a `/api/logs` request (#2043)

major.description: Added `STORE_ADDRESS` environment variable to index only a specific MUD Store.
major.title: fix(cli): add worldAddress to dev-contracts (#1892)

major.description: Records are now ordered by `lastUpdatedBlockNumber` at the Postgres SQL query level
major.title: fix(store-sync,store-indexer): make last updated block number not null (#1972)

major.description: Using `mud set-version --link` will no longer attempt to fetch the latest version from npm.
major.title: fix(cli): mud set-version --link shouldn't fetch versions (#2000)

major.description: Fixed an issue where `mud.config.ts` source file was not included in the package, causing TS errors downstream.
major.title: fix(store,world): fix mud config TS errors (#1974)

major.description: Added a script to run the decoded postgres indexer.
major.title: feat(store-indexer): command to run decoded indexer (#2001)

major.description:
Added explicit error logs for unexpected situations.
Previously all `debug` logs were going to `stderr`, which made it hard to find the unexpected errors.
Now `debug` logs go to `stdout` and we can add explicit `stderr` logs.
major.title: chore(store-indexer, store-sync): add explicit error logs (#2045)

major.description: The benchmark util now logs to `stdout` instead of `stderr`.
major.title: chore(common): log benchmark to stderr (#2047)

major.description: Added `isInstalled` and `requireNotInstalled` helpers to `Module` base contract.
major.title: feat(world): add isInstalled to Module (#2056)

major.description: `createStoreSync` now correctly creates table registration logs from indexer records.
major.title: fix(store-sync): create table registration logs from indexer records (#1919)

major.description: Added a Sentry middleware and `SENTRY_DNS` environment variable to the postgres indexer.
major.title: chore(store-indexer): setup Sentry middleware in indexer (#2054)

major.description: Replaced Fastify with Koa for store-indexer frontends
major.title: feat(store-indexer): replace fastify with koa (#2006)

major.description: Templates now correctly include their respective `.gitignore` files
major.title: fix(create-mud): include `.gitignore` files in created projects (#1945)

major.description: Deploys will now always rebuild `IWorld.sol` interface (a workaround for https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/6241)
major.title: fix(cli): always rebuild IWorld ABI (#1929)

major.description: TS packages now generate their respective `.d.ts` type definition files for better compatibility when using MUD with `moduleResolution` set to `bundler` or `node16` and fixes issues around missing type declarations for dependent packages.
major.title: build: allow use by TypeScript projects with `bundler`/`node16` config (#2084)

major.description: Disabled prepared statements for the postgres indexer, which led to issues in combination with `pgBouncer`.
major.title: fix(store-indexer): disable prepared statements (#2058)

major.description: Updated the `debug` util to pipe to `stdout` and added an additional util to explicitly pipe to `stderr` when needed.
major.title: chore: pipe debug logs to stdout, add separate util to pipe to stderr (#2044)

major.description: The error log if no data is found in `/api/logs` is now stringifying the filter instead of logging `[object Object]`.
major.title: chore(store-indexer): stringify filter in error log (#2048)

major.description: Added a binary for the `postgres-decoded` indexer.
major.title: fix(store-indexer): add postgres-decoded-indexer binary (#2062)

major.description: Renamed token address fields in ERC20 and ERC721 modules to `tokenAddress`
major.title: fix(world-modules): rename token address fields (#1986)

major.description: Fixed an issue where `useComponentValue` would not detect a change and re-render if the component value was immediately removed.
major.title: fix(react): trigger useComponentValue on deleted records (#1959)

major.description: Fixed invalid value when decoding records in `postgres-decoded` storage adapter
major.title: fix(store-sync): use dynamic data in postgres decoded indexer (#1983)

major.description: Updated to use MUD's `sendTransaction`, which does a better of managing nonces for higher volumes of transactions.
major.title: fix(faucet): use MUD's sendTransaction for better nonce handling (#2080)

major.description: `syncToZustand` now uses `tables` argument to populate the Zustand store's `tables` key, rather than the on-chain table registration events. This means we'll no longer store data into Zustand you haven't opted into receiving (e.g. other namespaces).
major.title: feat(dev-tools): show zustand tables (#1891)

major.description: Separated frontend server and indexer service for Postgres indexer. Now you can run the Postgres indexer with one writer and many readers.
major.title: feat(store-indexer): separate postgres indexer/frontend services (#1887)

major.description: Deploys now validate contract size before deploying and warns when a contract is over or close to the size limit (24kb). This should help identify the most common cause of "evm revert" errors during system and module contract deploys.
major.title: feat(cli): warn when contract is over or close to the size limit (#1894)

major.description: Added `isSchemaAbiType` helper function to check and narrow an unknown string to the `SchemaAbiType` type
major.title: fix(store): resolveUserTypes for static arrays (#1876)

major.description: Added Zustand support to Dev Tools:
major.title: feat(dev-tools): show zustand tables (#1891)

major.description: Added a new delegation control called `SystemboundDelegationControl` that delegates control of a specific system for some maximum number of calls. It is almost identical to `CallboundDelegationControl` except the delegatee can call the system with any function and args.
major.title: docs: add changeset for SystemboundDelegationControl (#1906)

major.description: Added `STORE_ADDRESS` environment variable to index only a specific MUD Store.
major.title: feat(store-indexer): add env var to index only one store (#1886)

major.description: Pinned prettier-plugin-solidity version to 1.1.3
major.title: fix(create-mud): pin prettier-plugin-solidity (#1889)

major.description: Added `--worldAddress` argument to `dev-contracts` CLI command so that you can develop against an existing world.
major.title: fix(cli): add worldAddress to dev-contracts (#1892)

major.description: Added an explicit package export for `mud.config`
major.title: fix(store,world): explicit mud.config exports (#1900)

major.description: Fixed `syncToZustand` types so that non-existent tables give an error and `never` type instead of a generic `Table` type.
major.title: fix(store-sync): show TS error for non-existent tables when using zustand (#1896)

major.description:
Fixed `resolveUserTypes` for static arrays.
`resolveUserTypes` is used by `deploy`, which prevented deploying tables with static arrays.
major.title: fix(store): resolveUserTypes for static arrays (#1876)

major.description: The `mud test` cli now exits with code 1 on test failure. It used to exit with code 0, which meant that CIs didn't notice test failures.
major.title: docs(faucet): fix default port in readme (#1835)

major.description: Removed `keccak256` and `keccak256Coord` hash utils in favor of [viem's `keccak256`](https://viem.sh/docs/utilities/keccak256.html#keccak256).
major.title: feat(utils): remove hash utils and ethers (#1783)

major.description: Removed `tableIds` filter option in favor of the more flexible `filters` option that accepts `tableId` and an optional `key0` and/or `key1` to filter data by tables and keys.
major.title: feat(store-indexer,store-sync): filter by table and key (#1794)

major.description: Replaced the `react` template with a basic task list app using the new Zustand storage adapter and sync method. This new template better demonstrates the different ways of building with MUD and has fewer concepts to learn (i.e. just tables and records, no more ECS).
major.title: feat(create-mud): move react template to zustand, add react-ecs template (#1851)

major.description: Updated templates to use [mprocs](https://github.com/pvolok/mprocs) instead of [concurrently](https://github.com/open-cli-tools/concurrently) for running dev scripts.
major.title: feat(create-mud): replace concurrently with mprocs (#1862)

major.description: Added an optional `tables` option to `syncToRecs` to allow you to sync from tables that may not be expressed by your MUD config. This will be useful for namespaced tables used by [ERC20](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/pull/1789) and [ERC721](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/pull/1844) token modules until the MUD config gains [namespace support](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/issues/994).
major.title: feat(store-sync): extra table definitions (#1840)

major.description:
Added the `ERC721Module` to `@latticexyz/world-modules`.
This module allows the registration of `ERC721` tokens in an existing World.
major.title: feat(world-modules): add ERC721 module (#1844)

major.description:
Added the `PuppetModule` to `@latticexyz/world-modules`. The puppet pattern allows an external contract to be registered as an external interface for a MUD system.
This allows standards like `ERC20` (that require a specific interface and events to be emitted by a unique contract) to be implemented inside a MUD World.
major.title: feat(world-modules): add puppet module (#1793)

major.description: Enabled MUD CLI debug logs for all templates.
major.title: feat(create-mud): enable MUD CLI debug logs (#1861)

major.description: Added a `filters` option to store sync to allow filtering client data on tables and keys. Previously, it was only possible to filter on `tableIds`, but the new filter option allows for more flexible filtering by key.
major.title: feat(store-indexer,store-sync): filter by table and key (#1794)

major.description:
Added the `ERC20Module` to `@latticexyz/world-modules`.
This module allows the registration of `ERC20` tokens in an existing World.
major.title: feat(world-modules): add ERC20 module (#1789)

major.description: Added a Zustand storage adapter and corresponding `syncToZustand` method for use in vanilla and React apps. It's used much like the other sync methods, except it returns a bound store and set of typed tables.
major.title: feat(store-sync): sync to zustand (#1843)

major.description: Added a `mapObject` helper to map the value of each property of an object to a new value.
major.title: feat(store): add experimental config resolve helper (#1826)

major.description: Updated templates' PostDeploy script to set store address so that tables can be used directly inside PostDeploy.
major.title: fix(create-mud): set store address in PostDeploy script (#1817)

major.description: Fixed an issue when creating a new project from the `react` app, where React's expressions were overlapping with Handlebars expressions (used by our template command).
major.title: fix(create-mud): workaround create-create-app templating (#1863)

major.description: Changed `mud` CLI import order so that environment variables from the `.env` file are loaded before other imports.
major.title: fix(cli): change import order so .env file is loaded first (#1860)

major.description: Removed chalk usage from modules imported in client fix downstream client builds (vite in particular).
major.title: fix(common,config): remove chalk usage (#1824)

major.description: Store config now defaults `storeArgument: false` for all tables. This means that table libraries, by default, will no longer include the extra functions with the `_store` argument. This default was changed to clear up the confusion around using table libraries in tests, `PostDeploy` scripts, etc.
major.title: feat(store): default off storeArgument (#1741)

major.description: `deploy`, `test`, `dev-contracts` were overhauled using a declarative deployment approach under the hood. Deploys are now idempotent and re-running them will introspect the world and figure out the minimal changes necessary to bring the world into alignment with its config: adding tables, adding/upgrading systems, changing access control, etc.
major.title: feat(cli): declarative deployment (#1702)

major.description: Modules now revert with `Module_AlreadyInstalled` if attempting to install more than once with the same calldata.
major.title: feat(world-modules): only install modules once (#1756)

major.description: Added TS helpers for calling systems dynamically via the World.
major.title: docs(world): add changeset for system call helpers (#1747)

major.description: Added a `Module_AlreadyInstalled` error to `IModule`.
major.title: feat(world-modules): only install modules once (#1756)

major.description:
- Added a `sendTransaction` helper to mirror viem's `sendTransaction`, but with our nonce manager
- Added an internal mempool queue to `sendTransaction` and `writeContract` for better nonce handling
- Defaults block tag to `pending` for transaction simulation and transaction count (when initializing the nonce manager)
major.title: feat(common): add sendTransaction, add mempool queue to nonce manager (#1717)

major.description: Added a `--alwaysRunPostDeploy` flag to deploys (`deploy`, `test`, `dev-contracts` commands) to always run `PostDeploy.s.sol` script after each deploy. By default, `PostDeploy.s.sol` is only run once after a new world is deployed.
major.title: feat(cli): add `--alwaysPostDeploy` flag to deploys (#1765)

major.description: Moves log output behind a debug flag. You can enable logging with `DEBUG=abi-ts` environment variable.
major.title: feat(abi-ts): move logs to debug (#1736)

major.description: CLI `deploy`, `test`, `dev-contracts` no longer run `forge clean` before each deploy. We previously cleaned to ensure no outdated artifacts were checked into git (ABIs, typechain types, etc.). Now that all artifacts are gitignored, we can let forge use its cache again.
major.title: feat(cli): remove forge clean from deploy (#1759)

major.description: Renames `resourceIdToHex` to `resourceToHex` and `hexToResourceId` to `hexToResource`, to better distinguish between a resource ID (hex value) and a resource reference (type, namespace, name).
major.title: feat(common): clarify resourceId (hex) from resource (object) (#1706)

major.description: Replaced temporary `.mudtest` file in favor of `WORLD_ADDRESS` environment variable when running tests with `MudTest` contract
major.title: feat(cli): remove .mudtest file in favor of env var (#1722)

major.description: Added `/healthz` and `/readyz` healthcheck endpoints for Kubernetes
major.title: feat(faucet,store-indexer): add k8s healthcheck endpoints (#1739)

major.description: Transactions sent via deploy will now be retried a few times before giving up. This hopefully helps with large deploys on some chains.
major.title: feat(cli): add retries to deploy (#1766)

major.description: `dev-contracts` will no longer bail when there was an issue with deploying (e.g. typo in contracts) and instead wait for file changes before retrying.
major.title: fix(cli): don't bail dev-contracts during deploy failure (#1808)

major.description: Parallelized table codegen. Also put logs behind debug flag, which can be enabled using the `DEBUG=mud:*` environment variable.
major.title: feat(store): parallelize table codegen (#1754)

major.description: Deploys now continue if they detect a `Module_AlreadyInstalled` revert error.
major.title: fix(cli): handle module already installed (#1769)

major.description: Changed deploy order so that system/module contracts are fully deployed before registering/installing them on the world.
major.title: fix(cli): deploy systems/modules before registering/installing them (#1767)

major.description: Deploy commands (`deploy`, `dev-contracts`, `test`) now correctly run `worldgen` to generate system interfaces before deploying.
major.title: fix(cli): run worldgen with deploy (#1807)

major.description: Moved some codegen to use `fs/promises` for better parallelism.
major.title: feat(store): parallelize table codegen (#1754)

major.description: Fixed a few issues with deploys:
major.title: fix(cli): support enums in deploy, only deploy modules/systems once (#1749)

major.description: Sped up builds by using more of forge's cache.
major.title: feat(cli,create-mud): use forge cache (#1777)

major.description: With [resource types in resource IDs](https://github.com/latticexyz/mud/pull/1544), the World config no longer requires table and system names to be unique.
major.title: feat(cli): declarative deployment (#1702)

major.description: Moved to new resource ID utils.
major.title: feat(common): clarify resourceId (hex) from resource (object) (#1706)
